598770.name: World of One - Soundtrack
598770.description:
Official soundtrack allows you to plunge deeper in the World of One.

OST contains music played at the levels during gameplay, mixed and mastered as whole, separated tracks.

OST Tracklist:

00) Stranger Places
01) Home, Sweet Home
02) The Journey Begins
03) Gravity
04) Grim Wood
05) The Main Enemy
06) Moonlight
07) Tomb Robber
08) Dance Macabre
09) Incomplete
10) Deus Vult
11) Pest Control
12) Dead Town
13) No one will come
14) Phonograph's waltz
15) Shadow Blade
16) Splitted Up
17) Ruined Graves
19) Shattered Remains
20) Lullaby
21) Behold!
22) When The Curtain Falls
23) Bonus track - Lullaby (orchestral version)
24) Bonus track - Shadow Blade (orchestral version)
